hudson.triggers.TimerTrigger.spec: # quarterly Feb May Aug Nov #H H 12 2,5,8,11 * # 7 days after Wikimedia Dump (5+7=12)

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors
# === STEP 1 OK php environments_2_eol.php _ '{"task": "generate_eol_tags_pensoft", "resource":"Raw English Wikipedia - initial step", "resource_id":"617", "subjects":"Description"}' #source is 80.tar.gz --- via API call using resource name "Raw English Wikipedia - initial step" #generates 617_ENV.tar.gz
# === just a utility #these 3 is just for stats = generates 3 reports ###php filter_term_group_by_taxa.php jenkins '{"source": "617_ENV", "target":"wikipedia_en_traits_FTG", "taxonIDs": "Q1357", "habitat_filter": "saline water"}' ###php filter_term_group_by_taxa.php jenkins '{"source": "617_ENV", "target":"wikipedia_en_traits_FTG", "taxonIDs": "Q1390", "habitat_filter": "saline water"}' ###php filter_term_group_by_taxa.php jenkins '{"source": "617_ENV", "target":"wikipedia_en_traits_FTG", "taxonIDs": "Q10908", "habitat_filter": "saline water"}' ###exit 0
# === STEP 2: OK #/* per: https://eol-jira.bibalex.org/browse/DATA-1870?focusedCommentId=65425&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-65425 #I'd like to filter out the "descendants_of_salt_water" terms for taxa that are descendants of these taxon IDs in the wikipedia traits resource: #(I may think of more; I'll add them here) #Q1390, Q1357, and Q10908 #i.e. no saltwater insects, spiders, or amphibians. # per Eli: as of 24Nov2025 there are 87 MoF records removed during this STEP 2. #*/ php filter_term_group_by_taxa.php _ '{"source": "617_ENV", "target":"wikipedia_en_traits_FTG", "taxonIDs": "Q1390, Q1357, Q10908", "habitat_filter": "saline water"}' #source is 617_ENV.tar.gz #generates wikipedia_en_traits_FTG.tar.gz
#exit 0
# === STEP 3: step OK # Wikipedia EN creates a new DwCA for its traits. Not like 'AmphibiaWeb text'. # Thus there is an extra step for Wikipedia EN: it removes taxa without MoF # per Eli: as of 24Nov2025 removed taxa without MoF = 470508 - 150616 = 319892 (acceptable) php remove_taxa_without_MoF.php _ '{"resource_id": "wikipedia_en_traits_FTG"}' # OLD: generates wikipedia_en_traits.tar.gz # NEW: generates wikipedia_en_traits_tmp1.tar.gz
# === STEP 4: new step OK # remove contradicting traits in MoF # per Eli: as of 24Nov2025 no MoF record removed. Numbers didn't change. php remove_contradicting_traits_from_MoF.php _ '{"resource_id": "wikipedia_en_traits_tmp1"}' # OLD: generates the final: wikipedia_en_traits.tar.gz # NEW: generates wikipedia_en_traits_tmp2.tar.gz
# === STEP 5: remove all records for taxon with habitat value(s) that are # descendants of both marine and terrestrial OK php rem_marine_terr_desc.php _ '{"resource_id":"wikipedia_en_traits_tmp2"}' #generates: wikipedia_en_traits_tmp3.tar.gz
#exit 0
# === STEP 5-a: step OK php remove_taxa_without_MoF.php _ '{"resource_id": "wikipedia_en_traits_tmp3"}' #generates wikipedia_en_traits_tmp4.tar.gz
# === STEP 6: fill-up missing parent entries OK # per Eli: as of 24Nov2025 149327 - 149319 = 8 taxa were removed in this step. # 138237 = No change in MoF records. php fill_up_undefined_parents_real.php _ '{"resource_id": "wikipedia_en_traits_tmp5", "source_dwca": "wikipedia_en_traits_tmp4", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents"}' #generates: wikipedia_en_traits_tmp5.tar.gz
exit 0
# === STEP 7: LAST STEP: copy wikipedia_en_traits_tmp5.tar.gz to wikipedia_en_traits.tar.gz OK cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/applications/content_server/resources_3 cp wikipedia_en_traits_tmp5.tar.gz wikipedia_en_traits.tar.gz ls -lt wikipedia_en_traits_tmp5.tar.gz ls -lt wikipedia_en_traits.tar.gz # then delete wikipedia_en_traits_tmp5.tar.gz rm -f wikipedia_en_traits_tmp5.tar.gz
exit 0
# === STEP 8 cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors ###php ckan_api_access.php _ "202fc4df-a6b3-4c12-8beb-6be8091bbbe0"
### works OK - a utility | Run separately after manually checking if file is good. ### php update_Zenodo_record_using_EOL_resourceID.php _ 'wikipedia_en_traits' ### Better yet run it here: http://160.111.248.39:8090/job/Zenodo/job/update_Zenodo_record/ ### So u don't need to comment original intructions above.
